DOC.brief_summary: This study will test the safety and efficacy of AAE581 in increasing Lumbar Spine bone mineral density (BMD) at 12 months, by Dexa-scan (DXA) in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of AAE581 in Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: BMD T Score between 2 to 3.5 5075 years old Urolithiasis Bisphosphonates Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
